original_text: The Reubenites, the Gadites and the half-tribe of Manasseh had 44,760 men ready for military service—able-bodied men who could handle shield and sword, who could use a bow, and who were trained for battle.
korean_text: 르우벤 자손과 갓 사람과 므낫세 반 지파에서 나가 싸울 만한 용사 곧 능히 방패와 칼을 들며 활을 당겨 싸움에 익숙한 자는 사만 사천칠백육십 명이라

sentences.original_text: The Reubenites, the Gadites and the half-tribe of Manasseh
sentences.korean_translation: 르우벤 지파, 갓 지파와 므낫세 반 지파는

sentences.original_text: had 44,760 men ready for military service
sentences.korean_translation: 군사 복무 준비가 된 44,760명의 남자들을 가졌다

sentences.original_text: who could handle shield and sword
and who were trained for battle
